item.description:
Let's dance to 80s music.

Heroes will be spinning and his myspace is Heroes

For some this is the music you got drunk and danced to in college, got drunk to in someone's basement in high school, or had your first dance to in middle school.

Or maybe the music you dig cause they're the "classic" - new british invasion, post punk goth, pregrunge rock, electropop, bighair spandex metal, whatever. I am hoping for Depeche Mode (Just can't get enough), New Order (Blue Monday, Bizzare Love Triangle, Ceremony), Whodini (Freaks Come out At Night), Run DMC, Talking Heads, the Cure, the Smiths, Bauhaus, P.I.L. and no Duran Duran or Michael Jackson.

But whatever Heroes spins, WE WILL HAVE GOOD TIME, SOLDIER!

More details to come after I contact the venue and know the head count. There is a $7 dollar cover.

I can get us advance tickets (usually there are none for non-concert night), if you RSVP and pay $7.42 ($7 cover +$0.42 transaction fee charged by meet up/amazon) by April 2 at 4 pm. The tickets allow you to get in even if they are at capacity and do not let anyone else in. My cell is 617-470-6212 so I can come out and give you the tix you purchased.

IF YOU RSVP AND PAY, SEND ME AN EMAIL SO I CAN GET YOU AN ADVANCE TICKET. Meetup does not let me know who has paid and who hasn't (only our fearless leader Roger is privy to that information)!
item.how_to_find_us: I will look AWESOME and geek it up with a balloon.
item.name: DJ Chris Ewen AKA Heroes spins 80's new wave at T.T.The Bear's Place
